info.title: AI2Fin Financial Management API
info.description: Enterprise-grade financial management platform with AI-powered categorization, tax optimization, and bill management. Built for scalability with 100K+ concurrent users.

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Invalid input or user already exists

post.description: Authenticate user and receive JWT token

get.description: Retrieve authenticated user information
Retrieve paginated list of bank transactions with filtering options

post.description: Manually add a new bank transaction
Upload and parse bank statement CSV file with intelligent categorization

get.description: Retrieve all bills with filtering and pagination
Get all recurring bill patterns with automatic occurrence generation

post.description: Create recurring bill pattern with automatic occurrence generation

get.description: Retrieve expenses with tax deduction information
AI-powered transaction categorization with tax deduction analysis
Get all user-defined automation rules for transactions, bills, and expenses

post.description: Create automation rule with conditions and actions
Manually execute a custom rule on matching transactions

get.description: Get all transaction/expense categories with tax settings
Retrieve comprehensive financial analytics and insights

post.description: Generate ATO-compliant tax deduction report

get.description: Retrieve user subscription tier and usage quotas
Get registered vehicles for travel expense tracking

post.description: Add vehicle for ATO logbook and travel deductions

get.description: Get recorded business trips for tax deductions

post.description: Log business trip for ATO travel expense claims

get.description: AI-powered search across transactions, bills, and expenses
Retrieve chat conversations for the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new chat conversation thread

get.description: Fetch a conversation with full message history

post.description: Send a user message and receive the AI assistant response

assetUrls.description: Optional uploaded asset URLs for the assistant to analyze

post.description: Upload one or more files (receipts, invoices, documents) for assistant processing
Initiate a streaming assistant response using Server-Sent Events (SSE)

get.description: Verify SSE streaming connectivity
Retrieve a previously uploaded file if the user is authorized

post.description: Extract structured data from an uploaded receipt or invoice

Model Context Protocol endpoint for ChatGPT Apps SDK integration. Supports OAuth (JWT) authentication. Provides 65+ financial tools for expense tracking, tax deductions, bill management, and financial analysis.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing JWT token

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - 200 requests per 15 minutes per user

post.description: Model Context Protocol endpoint for MCP Inspector tool and custom integrations. Supports API key authentication (X-API-Key header). Read-only by default. Rate limit: 50 requests per 15 minutes per API key.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key

403.description: Forbidden - Insufficient scope or write operation attempted

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - 50 requests per 15 minutes per API key

get.description: Health check endpoint for MCP Inspector (no authentication required)

post.description: Generate API key for MCP integrations, automation, and server-to-server communication. Requires admin authentication. API key is only shown once - save it immediately.

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user (admin access required)

post.description: Link an analyzed receipt to an existing entity or create a new expense

get.description: Fetch all active tax rates grouped by country
Retrieve active tax rates for a specific country

post.description: Calculate GST/VAT amounts for tax-inclusive or tax-exclusive inputs

countryCode.description: Fallback to lookup rate when provided

post.description: Analyze one or more transactions and return suggested categories with confidence and reasoning.

items.description: Transaction payload matching bank transaction shape

userProfile.description: Optional user profile overrides (businessType, profession, etc.)

post.description: Return tax deductibility analysis, documentation requirements, and GST considerations for each transaction.

items.description: Transaction payload matching bank transaction shape

userProfile.description: Optional user profile overrides (businessType, profession, etc.)

post.summary: Analyze single transaction for tax deductibility
post.description: Evaluate a single transaction using the intelligent tax deduction engine.
Persist AI tax analysis decisions (deductibility, business use, GST metadata) back to transactions.

get.description: Get all category sets for the authenticated user. Elite+ subscription required.

post.description: Create a new category set. Elite+ subscription required.

409.description: Category set with this name already exists

get.description: Get the currently active category set for the user.
Get a specific category set with its categories.

delete.description: Delete a category set. Categories will be moved to the default set. Default sets cannot be deleted.

post.description: Set a category set as the active set for the user.
Create a copy of a category set with all its categories.

409.description: Category set with this name already exists

post.description: Move a category from one set to another.

404.description: Category or target set not found

get.description: Get categories from specific sets, grouped by set ID. Useful for dropdowns and filtering.
Get all categories assigned to a transaction.

post.description: Assign a category to a transaction. Transactions can have multiple categories.

put.description: Replace all categories on a transaction with a new set of categories.

post.description: Assign multiple categories to a transaction at once.

delete.description: Remove a specific category assignment from a transaction.

get.description: Get full change history for a transaction, expense, bill, or bill pattern.
Get change history for a specific field of an entity. Maximum 11 changes are retained.
Get recent field changes for the authenticated user.

CategorySet.description: A category set for organizing categories into groups (e.g., Business Expenses, Tax Deductible, Personal). Elite+ feature.

isDefault.description: Whether this is the default category set (cannot be deleted)

isActive.description: Whether this is the currently active category set

categoryCount.description: Number of categories in this set

TransactionCategory.description: A category assignment for a transaction. Transactions can have multiple categories from different sets.

isPrimary.description: Whether this is the primary category for the transaction

confidence.description: AI confidence score for the assignment

TransactionFieldHistory.description: A history entry tracking a field change on a transaction, expense, bill, or bill pattern. Maximum 11 entries per field.

fieldName.description: Name of the field that was changed (e.g., categoryId, amount, description)

changeSource.description: Additional context about the change source

bearerAuth.description: JWT token obtained from /api/auth/login endpoint. Use for standard API access and OAuth-based integrations.

apiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
apiKeyAuth.description: API key for MCP integrations, automation, and server-to-server communication. Generate via /api/admin/api-keys endpoint. Format: mcp_<64 hex characters>. Ideal for /mcp/inspector endpoint and custom integrations.

tags.name: MCP Server
tags.description: Model Context Protocol endpoints for AI integrations. Finance MCP server with 65+ tools for expense tracking, tax deductions, bill management, and financial analysis. Supports OAuth (JWT) and API key authentication.
